item.title: Creator collective
item.description: We hear over and over that creativity is always one of the best skill to have for the future. Forbes says “Creativity will be one of the most desirable skills in the future workplace”* WEF puts “Creativity, originality and initiative” among the top 10 skills of 2025.* But why do so many creatives struggle? I start with the Big Questions “What if creators were valued as much as business people?”
